ðŸ“– Summary: WebShell is a secure HTTP server that enables users to execute command-line interface (CLI) commands through REST API endpoints. It offers both raw text and JSON output formats, a web-based SSH terminal for interactive shell access, and prioritizes security through command whitelisting and timeout protection. The tool also provides a health check endpoint for monitoring.
